snippet: President Petro O. Poroshenko, who has been trying to generate a sense of momentum for a lasting cease-fire, also ruled out trying to take back Crimea by force.
abstract: Ukrainian Pres Petro O Poroshenko says cease-fire pact with pro-Russia separatists appears to be growing stronger by the day; his remarks conspicuously avoid direct criticism of Russia.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: President Petro O. Poroshenko, who has been trying to generate a sense of momentum for a lasting cease-fire, also ruled out trying to take back Crimea by force.

headline.main: Truce Is Strengthening, Ukraine President Says
headline.print_headline: Truce Is Strengthening, Ukraine President Says
